name: AuditLog
description: Audit trail for tracking all changes to entities

entity_type.description: The type of entity (Order, Client, Site, Product, User)

entity_id.description: The ID of the affected entity

action.description: The action performed (create, update, delete, soft_delete, restore)

user_email.description: Email of the user who performed the action

changes.description: Object containing the changes made (before/after values)

metadata.description: Additional metadata (IP address, user agent, etc.)

timestamp.description: ISO timestamp of when the action occurred
